resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105725</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105725</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205624</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Skits and John Adams' Administration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Skits und John Adams' Leitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Skits et gestion de John Adams</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Skits e administração de John Adams'</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Skits e gestione del John Adams</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Skits και κυβέρνηση John Adams'</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Skits y administración de Juan Adams</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will perform skits which have been prepared on the events of John Adams' administration, including: The Alien and Sedition Acts, The Judiciary Act of 1801 (The Case of the Midnight Judges), The XYZ Affair, and the Kentucky and Virginia Resolves.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer führen die skits, die auf die 
Fälle John Adams' der Leitung vorbereitet worden sind durch und 
schließen ein: Die Ausländer-und Sedition-Taten, die 
richterliche Tat von 1801 (der Fall von den Mitternacht-Richtern), die
XYZ Angelegenheit und die Kentucky und Virginia Beschlüsse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants exécuteront les skits qui ont 
été préparés sur les événements de la gestion de John Adams, 
incluant : Les actes d'étranger et de sedition, l'acte 
judiciaire de 1801 (le cas des juges de minuit), l'affaire de XYZ, et 
les résolutions du Kentucky et de la Virginie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes executarão os skits que foram 
preparados nos eventos da administração de John Adams', incluindo: 
Os atos do estrangeiro e do sedition, o ato judiciary de 1801 (o
exemplo dos juizes da meia-noite), o caso de XYZ, e os resolves de 
Kentucky e de Virgínia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi effettueranno gli skits che sono stati
preparati sugli eventi della gestione del John Adams, includenti: 
Le Leggi di sedition e dello straniero, la Legge giudiziaria di 
1801 (il caso dei giudici di mezzanotte), l'affare di XYZ e le 
risoluzioni della Virginia e del Kentucky.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα εκτελέσουν skits που έχουν 
προετοιμαστεί στα γεγονότα της κυβέρνησης John Adams', που 
περιλαμβάνει: Ο αλλοδαπός και ο στασιασμός ενεργούν, ο 
δικαστικός νόμος 1801 (η περίπτωση των δικαστών μεσάνυχτων), η
υπόθεση XYZ, και το Κεντάκυ και η Βιρτζίνια επιλύουν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes realizarán los skits que han 
estado preparados en los acontecimientos de la administración de Juan
Adams, incluyendo: Los actos del extranjero y de la sedición, 
el acto judicial de 1801 (el caso de los jueces de la medianoche), el 
asunto de XYZ, y las resoluciones de Kentucky y de Virginia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:ANGIE PANEL HOLTHAUSEN

VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>

            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105725</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
